TopicTitle: Orion - A Voyage to Duna (Inspired by Interstellar) [OUT NOW]

Articles.Content:
It is finally here! This is my very first proper cinematic and I really hope you guys enjoy it as much as I enjoyed making it.
Of course, I'm not Nassault, but I was very much inspired by his work.
I will publish the ship .craft files in a separate thread in the spacecraft exchange before 24/12/2014. Edited December 19, 2014 by SpaceXray
Very nice to see others doing Interstellar type videos. Nice job!
Thanks! I didn't want to spoil anything, the teaser contains only a fraction of the footage.

I'm glad to say I am 90% done on the movie. It will be 15-20 minutes long since that is the perfect length.

Do you guys want a few teaser screenshots?
Yes please!

A little hint: I think I will re-do the first launch shown in the teaser and use Camera tools this time. I want quality in my first proper cinematic.

And also:

Ahhh... I assume lots of people want to create interstellar tributes/remakes/movies based off it, most notably the great Nassault. Interesting shuttle design... i may have a next gen shuttle design similar to yours( shuttle is the term i use for a ranger, in ksp, unless it's that one in benjee's endurance mod).

I also have a concept mission, INTEGRITY, but i will only at most write a story and post images instead of a cinematic, mainly because i have no experience recording, voicing, editing, and i don't even have a recording software.

and my computer is powered by potatoes.

My only KSP videos mainly featured raw recordings layered with some music. This is my first proper cinematic and I had a lot of fun recording and editing and being in the director's shoes. I had no experience previously, but as I learn I gain more and learn new tips and tricks.

This is what the Orion IV is based off:

A new teaser GIF, my very first in fact.

I had to re-shoot half of my footage because the first half was lacking quality unlike the 2nd.

Now I am fully satisfied, all that is left is final editing. Then I can finally upgrade my save to 0.90

Edited December 16, 2014 by SpaceXray
by any chance, is that the Orion Nuclear propulsion spacecraft concept?

by any chance, is that the Orion Nuclear propulsion spacecraft concept?

Yup, I liked the design so I replaced the back with a regular chemical engine.

A new teaser GIF, my very first in fact.

http://i.imgur.com/q6DLaYw.gif

I like that gif. I didn't watch the Interestellar movie quite yet, but I will be waiting for your version.

Cheers.

Edited December 22, 2014 by Etsu

I like that gift. I didn't watch the Interestellar movie quite yet, but I will be waiting for your version.

Cheers.

You are missing out on Interstellar, I mean it's sucha great and inspirational movie it inspired me to spend weeks making a 25 min cinematic, my longest yet.
It's finally out
It is, I think. Plates, magazines, and everything.
The craft files are available in the spacecraft exchange and in the Zokesia SKunkworks repository.
Should I upload to vimeo too?
Amazing. Teach me, sir.

Amazing. Teach me, sir.

it's just a lot of trial-and-error, camera work and music sync.
Nice job with the soundtrack.

Nice job with the soundtrack.

Thank you!
